properties.name: description
properties.value: The Consortium of Extra-Planar Merchandise Transferral Specialists is an organisation that supplies dragon weapons to the shops that sell them, such as Daga's Scimitar Smithy.[1] They are represented by Carruthers, Landsbottom and Og.

content:
This article contains information only featured in Postbag from the Hedge.
Postbags released during the RuneScape 2 era (2005-07) are generally not considered canon, unless otherwise mentioned. Postbags released during the Old School era (since 2021) are generally considered canon.

The Consortium of Extra-Planar Merchandise Transferral Specialists is an organisation that supplies dragon weapons to the shops that sell them, such as Daga's Scimitar Smithy.[1] They are represented by Carruthers, Landsbottom and Og.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Postbag 13 - "Transcript:The Evil Chicken defends his reputation.", Letter 2, by C. P. L-F. Carruthers, Esq (LLB). RuneScape Postbags from the Hedge.
